entry.title: Fruits of Our Labor
entry.summary:
Author: acatcam

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,861Chapters: 19/?Kudos: 423

Summary: Clark Kent and Bruce Wayne have been dating for a year—quietly, carefully, and very much in love. In public, they’re professional colleagues; in private, Bruce teases and Clark blushes his way through domestic bliss. Meeting the four Wayne sons was nerve-wracking enough, but now Bruce has been acting… off.A “stomach bug,” Clark insists.A “mystery,” Bruce argues.Neither of them expect the doctor’s results that leave Bruce speechless—and Clark ugly crying with joy. Or: a fic about fatherhood, family dinners, a overprotective farmboy, and the world’s most unexpected pregnancy

entry.title: Man of Tomorrow, Knight of Now
entry.summary:
Author: acatcam

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,418Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 82

Summary: Clark Kent has spent decades saving the world — long enough to believe he’s seen it all. Until Gotham’s new vigilante catches his attention. Investigating the “Batman” should’ve been simple: another story for the Daily Planet, another mystery unraveled. But the deeper he looks, the clearer it becomes that Gotham’s masked knight isn’t just a mystery. He’s Bruce Wayne — young, brilliant, and carrying the kind of loneliness Clark remembers all too well. What begins as curiosity turns into something else when Bruce’s excuses for lingering around Metropolis start pointing towards one thing. Or: an older Superman meets a younger Batman, and they learn that sometimes even heroes need saving — and that not every kind of heat comes from battle

entry.title: Stop the World (I Wanna Get Off With You)
entry.summary:
Author: GhostofMoth

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,768Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 42

Summary: “God,” Bruce muttered, his voice low and husky already, “I’ve been waiting all night for this. You know how hard it was for me to just watch you across the room like that?” His hands wandered the soft fabric of Clark’s shirt, dipping beneath his suit jacket. A pang of desire rushed through him, and he felt his face warm. “Bruce…” Clark warned, near whisper as Bruce's hands moved. “You can’t be serious. Here?” “The door’s locked.” Bruce moved closer, their bodies nearly flushed against each other. “Besides, these things are so boring. Only good thing is getting to see you in a suit. And you look really good, mind you”---Clark is bored out of his mind at a gala. Bruce decides to fix that.

entry.title: How did two broke journalists wind up with the famously unattainable bachelor billionaires?
entry.summary:
Author: tearsofjoyandsorrow

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,184Chapters: 7/18Kudos: 75

Summary: What if there were a universe where DC and Marvel were intermixed and we got to see the insane similarities of superbat and starker?In this universe, it just so happens that the Daily Bugle and the Daily Planet are sister companies working out of New York and Metropolis, respectively, and every once and a while, there are larger crossover events in which Peter Parker and Clark Kent interact. They aren't best friends by any means, but they get along quite well.Simultaneously, Bruce Wayne and Tony Stark are maintaining a strange frenemies dynamic. When the world looks like it's going to end, the two of them band together to resolve things, but outside of that, they frequently try to one-up each other with their tech, bank accounts and sexual conquests.I'm still not sure what I am doing, but someone said they would read this, so here I try!

entry.title: Call me daddy
entry.summary:
Author: Speechless_since_1998

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,114Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 180

Summary: "Jesus, Superman, don't treat me like I'm a child. You're not my fucking father!” He realized what he'd said a second too late. It was a default mode, when he argued with Bruce, to remind him that he wasn't his father, he hadn't been adopted, he'd been easily replaced, there was nothing between them. Nothing. And never mind his hurt feelings, and the loss he felt. Bruce had made it clear what he thought of their relationship. And Dick wasn't a child anymore. He was almost ashamed of his outburst when Superman sneered dangerously, "You're right. I'm not your fucking dad. I'm fucking your dad."   (Sooner or later, they'll have to find a way to prevent so many aliens from obtaining kryptonite and its variants. But for now, Clark can uninhibitedly get some things off his chest with Dick.)
